term.title: bimodal distribution

item.text: The occurrence of two maxima in a frequency distribution.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 17. 'Free energies of cation-molecule complex formation and cation-solvent transfers' on page 21 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062010017)

term.citation: Citation: 'bimodal distribution' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.B00644
